title.narrative: Joint Executive Program of a project to assist in the reintegration of returning and displaced students in host communities in Lahjj, Republic of Yemen.

description.narrative: Contribute to the stabilization and recovery process in the governorate of Lahjj and to the sustainable integration of displaced returnees and host communities through projects to improve education opportunities resulting from active community participation and leadership, thus responding to the urgent needs resulting from the massive return movement and building trust among host communities, IDPs and returnees. Hand and build trust between government and communities 1. Creating an appropriate educational environment in the governorate of Lahjj for returnees and displaced persons 2 - Contribute to building confidence in the relations between government and communities Restoration of 4 schools benefiting 3268 students at a cost of US $ 590,000 8 teacher training courses (200 teachers).
